name: mWeatherWidget
tagline: Android app: launcher widget to monitor temperature and other weather data from a web server
body:
### Welcome to mWeatherWidget project home!

Tiny widget-only application to monitor current temperature and some other weather data on your android deviceâ€™ launcher / homescreen.

Interaction with widget happens by tapping, it reacts on single, double and triple taps.

The application request data from a web server by GET method and parses values from the received XML/HTML data string.

The data provider used in the sources is http://weather.willab.fi/weather.html

Fork the project and build your own weather monitor !
### Contact
mWeatherWidget OSS project is done and maintained by [Maxim Abrosimov](http://fi.linkedin.com/pub/maxim-abrosimov/6/59/2a8/)
